attributes.action: increase the maximum width of trailers to the European recommended 2.55 metres
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many European caravans are over the 2.3 maximum width that you are allowed to tow with a car in the UK. To legally tow anything over 2.3 metres in the UK requires a vehicle with a MGVW over 3500kg. This means you require a large van or lorry which are not accepted at many caravan sites.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "increase the maximum width of trailers to the European recommended 2.55 metres."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14910.asp
